Name: Cat Life
About the game: Cat Life Have you ever wished you had a cat's life ? It's not as easy as you might imagine ... To sum up An open-world action-adventure game focused on PvE combat, exploration, and survival. Description of the game Cat Life is an action-adventure game where you control a cat. You play in an open world, with total freedom of movement: you have the ability to climb on all natural or artificial structures. Survive will not be easy, you will have to feed yourself, resist bad weather, and face many opponents! Progress through the main questline to solve the mystery of the island and unlock all of your character's abilities. Or freely explore the world that opens up to you, as well as the mini-games to discover. Detailed Content An open world of 4 kmÂ², a wild island in a temperate biome, with a few inhabited areas Full freedom of movement, including verticality, with the ability to climb all trees and buildings Hundreds of NPCs, among a bestiary of 40 types of creatures, friendly or enemy A series of 40 quests to follow in the main story line Timed mini-games, agility courses and more Day/night cycle, and weather events (rain, snow, storm) Hidden rewards to discover while exploring the world An experience mechanism to progress through 50 levels Survival management : health and energy, but also hunger and thirst
